original_text: The books of their clans show that they had many wives and sons. They had 36,000 men who were ready to fight in the army.
korean_text: 그들과 함께 있는 자는 그 계보와 종족대로 능히 출전할 만한 군대가 삼만 육천 명이니 이는 그 처자가 많기 때문이며

sentences.original_text: The books of their clans show
that they had many wives and sons
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 많은 아내와 아들을 두었다는 것을

sentences.original_text: who were ready to fight in the army
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 군대에서 싸울 준비가 되어 있었습니다
